front.title: The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) UPDATE Method

abstract.t: This specification defines the new UPDATE method for the SessionInitiation Protocol (SIP). UPDATE allows a client to updateparameters of a session (such as the set of media streams and theircodecs) but has no impact on the state of a dialog. In that sense, itis like a re-INVITE, but can be sent before the initial INVITE hascompleted. This makes it very useful for updating session parameterswithin early dialogs.
